attributes.action: Leave the European Convention on Human Rights (ECHR)
attributes.additional_details: Making our own Human rights rules is much better as every country is different. As the UK is in such decline from Illegal immigration. We need tougher rules to stop them arriving and a way of getting rid of them. Not funding illegal migrants also means the government can save more money to fix the NHS
attributes.background: Stop all aid(Accommodation commodities, money and healthcare) to Illegal migrants. Only a critically ill asylum seeker may receive medical care from the NHS

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for a similar action:

Hold a referendum to decide if the UK should leave the ECHR
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700614

Reduce funds directed towards migrant support by 70%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702843
